bug.short_desc: diff view is empty in Internet Explorer

long_desc.thetext: When viewing a diff between two versions of a file in OpenGrok 0.9, Internet Explorer only shows the header. See this thread: http://mail.opensolaris.org/pipermail/opengrok-discuss/2010-May/002270.html

I've investigated this together with Lubos, and we only manage to reproduce the problem using a small IE window on Windows 2003. We didn't manage to reproduce it on Windows XP using the exact same version of Internet Explorer 8, so it may be a Win2003 bug of some kind.

On 20.5.2010 15:52, Lubos Kosco wrote: > On 19.5.2010 3:09, Jun wrote: >> My system is Windows XP version 2002, SP3 >> IE: 8.0.6001.18702CO > > hmm, I installed some IE compatibility view update from latest updates and we are not able to reproduce this problem anymore ... > I will however check the css we use again to see if I could somehow avoid this even for not updated IEs ...
I think it was this one: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/980302
-- L

Closing as invalid on the assumption that this is caused by a bug in IE fixed by the compatibility update mentioned by Ľuboš. If someone can reproduce it on a fully updated system, feel free to reopen.
